text: Mustang is a town in the U.S. state of Texas. There were only 21 people living there in the year 2010, but nobody lived there in 2020. It was the smallest town in Texas in terms of population. In December 2021, Mark Cuban, entrepreneur and former owner of the Dallas Mavericks, purchased the town for roughly $2 million. == References == Category:Towns in Texas
title: Mustang, Texas
